attributes.action: Amalgate all petitions that are obviously of the same context so as to enable the strength of feeling on a particular subject.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Quite a lot of petitions are about the same underlying problem. (In my case lack of legislation on cat behaviour). If these problems were constantly updated into one petition it would give a better perspective into the strength of feeling and at the same time stop a lot of clutter on the website.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
